channel.title: A server/client downloader in J#
channel.description:
well here is a picture lol
[img]http://i22.servimg.com/u/f22/11/28/71/73/downlo10.png[/img]
and it is now going on KBytes if its lower then 1 MB if its higher then 1MB then it says MBytes instead of KBytes
and no bytes
[b]How to set it up:[/b]
go into the file [code]server-client downloader.exe.config[/code]
and inside there change these things
[code]http://swe3.runescape.com/[/code] to the location of the URL where your file is... it must end on / and start on http://
[code]runescape.jar[/code] to the filename your gonna download
and the URL should not contain the filename
and then save it and give it out to people and they can download it
[b]Requirements:[/b] .NET
[b]Info:[/b] when its done with the downloading so does it automatically start the file so like if you download server.rar it would open it automatically when its done
Download [url=http://www.box.net/shared/f12hsq4axi]Here[/url]

@kevin5475845 wrote:

well here is a picture lol

and it is now going on KBytes if its lower then 1 MB if its higher then 1MB then it says MBytes instead of KBytes

and no bytes

How to set it up:

go into the file server-client downloader.exe.config

and inside there change these things

http://swe3.runescape.com/ to the location of the URL where your file is… it must end on / and start on http://

runescape.jar to the filename your gonna download

and the URL should not contain the filename

and then save it and give it out to people and they can download it

Info:
when its done with the downloading so does it automatically start the file so like if you download server.rar it would open it automatically when its done
